# compute

**Type Property**

A tensor context that applies to compute encoders.

## Declaration

```swift
static var compute: MTLTensorUsage { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use tensors with this context in [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4ComputeCommandEncoder] or [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLComputeCommandEncoder] instances.
